question: Some people think that as long as professional sportsmen and sportswomen are good players, their behavior on and off the paying fields is not important.Do you agree or disagree?
text: Sports play an indispensable role in the life of every individual. It is believed by many people that the behaviour of sportspersons does not matter at all if they are well experienced in their field whilst some are against this. This essay will shed light on it in the upcoming paragraphs before stating any opinion on it.

On the one hand, People put across various points to  support their viewpoint. Firstly, according to them, personal traits have no relevance in the game which is played by the players. Therefore, they think that  these features are not essential on the field but only the performance in sports is needed to be good. To illustrate it, good nature with others on the ground will not ensure the winning of the match. Apart from this, it is also considered that professional and personal lives are different from each other, thus, they believe it does not matter what they are doing off the playing field.

On the other hand, myriad experts are opposing this view and think that it is equally important as sportsmanship. Primarily, the Personality of a sportsman describes the attitude of that man towards the game as well as other fellow players. For instance, In the Indian cricket team, there is great coordination which is totally based on their good behaviour with each other and the audience as well as their fans. Moreover, a good demeanour helps to build good relationships and team-spirit which can lead to the path to success.

Additionally, these skills are also beneficial while sportsmen and sportswomen are off-field.It will help them to get popularity and be well-known celebrities. For example, if they behave well with their family and the media persons it will attract the attention of numerous fans towards them which will make them more famous and popular.

To conclude, I would like to reiterate that there are both views of it, however, if I consider it logically then I believe that the latter view is more powerful and effective. Hence, I agree with it that these traits have a major role in their lives and players should maintain these characteristics in order to survive.
